text:
I am running an Ant build with a javac task in it.  My JAVA_HOME is set to
SET JAVA_HOME=C:\JAVA\J2SDK1.4.2_03
The file tools.jar is, as it is supposed to be, in JAVA_HOME\lib\tools.jar.

When I run my Ant build I get: "Unable to find tools.jar.  Expected to find it
in c:\JAVA\J2SDK1.4.2_03\JRE\lib\tools.jar"

Why is it looking in the JRE\lib and not in the lib?
creator: cdfishernew@usa.net

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25798 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
